I will keep the message brief, clear, and commit-ready to minimize friction if an opening exists.

conversation.message:
Dear Student_C,

Thank you for your continued interest in School_C and for your application in this final round.

We are able to offer you admission to School_C, and we acknowledge your commitment to enroll immediately.

Sincerely,
School_C Admissions

[ACCEPT]
conversation.thought: School_C’s true priority ranks Student_C last among acceptable students. With quota 1 and no other applicants in the final-round inbox, the choice is between matching with our lowest-priority acceptable student or leaving the seat unfilled. Given the objective to match as high as possible within quota, accepting Student_C does not block a higher-priority student this round (none are contacting us), and the market ends at round 30, so waiting yields an unfilled seat. Therefore accept to fill the seat with the best available option in the final round.
